SEARCH
Module help
Package help

Class OMoviesController

java.lang.Object
help.OMoviesController
public class OMoviesController extends Object
Controller class for managing movie-related actions in the application. Handles interactions with the user interface related to movie management, such as deleting, adding, or editing movie details.

  • Method Details

    • handleCloseButtonAction

      private void handleCloseButtonAction(javafx.event.ActionEvent event)
      Handles the close button action. This method closes the current stage (window) when the user clicks the close button.
      Parameters:
      event - The event triggered by the close button click.

    • handleMinimizeButtonAction

      private void handleMinimizeButtonAction(javafx.event.ActionEvent event)
      Handles the minimize button action. This method minimizes the current stage (window) when the user clicks the minimize button.
      Parameters:
      event - The event triggered by the minimize button click.

    • initialize

      public void initialize()
      Initializes the controller. Sets up the combo box with genre options, binds the table columns to the movie properties, and loads the movie data from the database.

    • onAdd

      private void onAdd(javafx.event.ActionEvent event) throws SQLException
      Handles the add movie button action. This method validates the inputs, checks if the movie already exists, and adds the new movie to the database.
      Parameters:
      event - The event triggered by the add button click.
      Throws:
      SQLException - If there is an issue with the database operation.

    • onUpdate

      private void onUpdate(javafx.event.ActionEvent event) throws SQLException
      Handles the update movie button action. This method validates the inputs, checks if the movie exists, and updates the selected movie in the database.
      Parameters:
      event - The event triggered by the update button click.
      Throws:
      SQLException - If there is an issue with the database operation.

    • onClear

      private void onClear(javafx.event.ActionEvent event)
      Handles the clear button action. This method clears all the fields in the form.
      Parameters:
      event - The event triggered by the clear button click.

    • onImport

      private void onImport(javafx.event.ActionEvent event) throws IOException
      Handles the import movie poster button action. This method opens a file chooser to select an image file and imports the selected poster for the movie.
      Parameters:
      event - The event triggered by the import button click.
      Throws:
      IOException - If there is an issue with reading the file.

    • onRowSelect

      private void onRowSelect(javafx.scene.input.MouseEvent event)
      Handles the row selection event in the movie table. This method sets the selected movie's information into the form for editing.
      Parameters:
      event - The mouse event triggered by selecting a row in the table.

    • onDelete

      private void onDelete(javafx.event.ActionEvent event)
      Handles the delete movie button action. This method checks if a movie is selected, shows a confirmation dialog, and deletes the selected movie from the database upon confirmation.
      Parameters:
      event - The event triggered by the delete button click.

    • loadMoviesFromDatabase

      private void loadMoviesFromDatabase()
      Loads the movies from the database into the movie list.

    • clearForm

      private void clearForm()
      Clears all the input fields and the movie poster.

    • showAlert

      private void showAlert(javafx.scene.control.Alert.AlertType alertType, String title, String content)
      Shows an alert with a specified type, title, and content message.
      Parameters:
      alertType - The type of the alert (e.g., WARNING, INFORMATION, ERROR).
      title - The title of the alert.
      content - The content message of the alert.

    • displayPoster

      private void displayPoster(Movie movie)
      Displays the movie poster for the selected movie. If the movie has no poster, the image view is cleared.
      Parameters:
      movie - The movie whose poster needs to be displayed.

    • onSchedule

      public void onSchedule(javafx.event.ActionEvent event) throws IOException
      Loads the Monthly Schedule screen into the current window.
      Parameters:
      event - The event triggered by the "Schedule" button click.
      Throws:
      IOException - If there is an issue with loading the FXML file.

    • onOrganizeMovies

      public void onOrganizeMovies(javafx.event.ActionEvent event) throws IOException
      Loads the Organize Movies screen into the current window.
      Parameters:
      event - The event triggered by the "Organize Movies" button click.
      Throws:
      IOException - If there is an issue with loading the FXML file.

    • onCancellationsRefunds

      public void onCancellationsRefunds(javafx.event.ActionEvent event) throws IOException
      Loads the Cancellations and Refunds screen into the current window.
      Parameters:
      event - The event triggered by the "Cancellations and Refunds" button click.
      Throws:
      IOException - If there is an issue with loading the FXML file.

    • handleSignOutButtonAction

      private void handleSignOutButtonAction(javafx.event.ActionEvent event)
      Handles the sign-out button action. This method loads the login screen and switches the current window to the login scene.
      Parameters:
      event - The event triggered by the sign-out button click.

    • changeScene

      private void changeScene(javafx.stage.Stage stage, javafx.scene.Parent root, String newSceneTitle)
      Helper function to change the scene of the current stage.
      Parameters:
      stage - The current stage.
      root - The new root of the scene.
      newSceneTitle - The title for the new scene.
